text: hi everyone I hope you're having a great
time watching work up today I will be
making another drinking food for you to
enjoy while watching the games is called
but I TN rare beef in lime juice salad
the concept of the dish is quite similar
to an Italian dish called Cappuccio in
which things lysis of beef are served
raw or rare is perfect to serve as an
appetizer or drinking food mom now I've
recently tried this dish as the drinking
place in Vietnam and was really
impressed by the ties of it so today I
will try to duplicate this dish at home
let's begin recipe for the ingredients
you're gonna need fresh thinly sliced
beef 2 red or yellow onion a knob of
garlic some fried shallots humphy and
roasted peanuts your favorite - fresh
Vietnamese herbs for limes and red
peppers you can use subtle herbs rice
paddy herbs or mint firstly peel and
mince the garlic finely cut red peppers
into thin slices on the diagonal slice
the onions into very thin slices you can
slide the onions crosswise or lengthwise
like this then soak in a bowl of ice
cold water to reduce the strong onion
smell and also to make it more crispy
then drain well and mix with 2
tablespoons of sugar and 3 tablespoons
of vinegar mix well and set aside for 15
minutes then you will have sweet and
sour onions roll the line under your
palms on the culture to make it more
juicy then cut in half and squeeze out
all the juice you will need about 1/2 a
cup of lime juice for 500 gram beef for
the beef you can use filet mignon so now
I or I abroad
sure that is really fresh and asked the
butcher to slide it really thinly for
you separate the slices so that is can
absorb the seasonings well then season
with salt and pepper about half a
teaspoon each I also add about 1
teaspoon of stock powder which is
optional and a good tablespoon of sugar
you will need that much sugar to balance
out the sourness of the lime juice you
can mix with chopsticks but at before
using my hands to mix up the beef to
help distribute the seasonings into your
every slice leave it for 10 minutes and
then add the lime juice we are not going
to cook the beef under any heat at all
but rather let the acid in the citrus
cook the beef itself give it a good mix
again cover and refrigerate for 15
minutes after 15 minutes you will see
that the beef hash changes color the
mean is no longer raw but has become
rare now add about 2 to 3 tablespoons of
vegetable oil in a pan and fry the
minced garlic until golden brown then
quickly pour the fried garlic and hot
oil into the ear and mix well to add
more flavor that's it we are done now
it's time to assemble the salad
I have also roughly chop up the herbs
wash a few times and drain now on a
large serving platter add a lot of herbs
then top with the pickled sweet-and-sour
onion and a chorus top it off with the
rare beef
then garnish with roasted crushed
peanuts and crispy fried shallots
some more red pepper slices for more
heat in color and some prawn crackers at
the side for dipping you can use anchovy
sauce or any other sauce that you like
for the recipe of the anchovy fish sauce
just click on it to serve just mix it up
and put on top of the prawn cracker mmm
it tastes perfect with a sip of beer
that's it I hope you enjoyed this recipe
and if you decide to give it a try
please upload a photo of your food on
Instagram Facebook or Google+ and insult
hashtag heron recipes so at least I can
try your food with my eyes and share it
with everyone else here I hope the
photos also help other viewers to have
some clue what to cook next week if
you're looking for more recipe ideas for
drinking food check out my mom no fly
list it will make your work up season
more exciting if you liked the video
don't forget to click like and subscribe
to my channel for more Vietnamese food
thank you for watching bye bye
you
